data.title: Accommodation In Giyani, Mopani, South Africa
data.meta_description: Best Hotel Accomodation in Giyani. Affordable guesthouse and rooms in Giyani, Mopani, South Africa
data.text:
Double / twin single beds

We have comfortable room with en-suite facilities made up either with a double bed or twin single beds.

When you make a reservation please let us know whether you want a double bed or 2 single beds.

Luxurious facilities

In-Room We can host up to a total of 550 guests in our conference halls for indoor events, as well as more than 1 000 guests in our garden space for outdoor events. All these can be customized and decorated to meet your requirements. Attractions Valley of the Olifants, Kruger National Park are some of the attractions to view nearby. Area Information Giyani's location in the warm African Bushveld makes it attractive for both local and international visitors. The Giyani Golf course is home to zebra, giraffe, bushbuck and some other herbivores. Viewing of these animals has not yet been commercialized.

If you are looking for a stay in Giyani or a clean accommodation in Giyani then Kulani country house can be a solution

Giyani accommodation

Kulani Country House is situated only about 3km out of Giyani Town in Limpopo Province (South Africa), along the R529 road. Giyani is situated on the northern bank of the Klein Letaba River, west of the Kruger National Park, and 104 km from Tzaneen. Giyani is an ideal stopover location for guests travelling to the Kruger National Park and is only 105 km from the Phalaborwa Gate, and Kulani Country House is the ideal destination for a revitalizing pit stop..

4 Bedrooms
